alert.note: Alert for Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hertford and southeastern Southampton Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newsoms, or 7 miles east of Boykins, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Como around 525 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Riddicksville, Sunbeam, Handsom, Bartonsville, Riverdale, Barretts Crossroad and Chowan Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
